title: ESA: Time to Assert Europe’s “Rightful Place” in Space
summary: The ministers of the European Space Agency’s member states today committed to a “paradigm shift” in the European space program and “asserting Europe’s rightful place in the world.” Meeting as […]

title: Canadian government backs 2024 space accelerator in Southern California
summary: Canadian space entrepreneurs seeking to raise $500,000 to $20 million are invited to join the 2024 SoCal-Canadian Space Accelerator.

title: ESA to start commercial cargo program
summary: The European Space Agency announced Nov. 6 it will start a competition to develop commercial vehicles to transport cargo to and from the International Space Station by 2028, a step towards developing a crewed vehicle.

title: LeoLabs data shows on-orbit maneuvers by Russian satellites
summary: The space tracking firm LeoLabs over the past year tracked two Russian satellites performing rendezvous and proximity operations.

title: Astra secures interim financing deal
summary: WASHINGTON — Launch vehicle and spacecraft propulsion company Astra Space said Nov. 6 that it has secured interim financing from two investors that gives the company through the end of […]
